data.message: Why are people able to tag me in pictures and posts that I'm not friends with and only have one friend in common but not direct friends

replies.message: Hey William. Anyone can tag you in photos and other posts. Tags from people you're not friends with may appear in your Timeline review, where you can decide if you want to allow them on your Timeline. Remember, posts you choose not to allow on your Timeline may appear in News Feed and elsewhere on Facebook. If you don't like something you're tagged in, you can remove the tag or ask the person who tagged you to remove the post. -Hailey

Yeah but then how come when I want to tag someone I'm not friends with doesn't work like I'm in a group with someone I want to tag but I can't tag them how do I do it then if any random person can tag me?
Thank you william. (Exmple:I couldn't tag William)
